Key Resources & Tools

Popular Platforms & Frameworks

  • OpenAI API: GPT models, DALL-E, Whisper
  • Anthropic Claude: Constitutional AI approach
  • Google Vertex AI: Managed ML platform
  • Amazon Bedrock: Foundation model service
  • Azure OpenAI: Enterprise OpenAI integration
  • Hugging Face: Model hub and transformers
  • LangChain: LLM application framework
  • LlamaIndex: Data framework for LLMs

System Design Tools

  • Docker & Kubernetes: Containerization
  • Apache Kafka: Event streaming
  • Redis: Caching and queuing
  • Prometheus & Grafana: Monitoring
  • MLflow: ML lifecycle management
  • Kubeflow: ML workflows on Kubernetes
  • Ray: Distributed computing
  • Apache Airflow: Workflow orchestration

Evaluation & Testing

  • BLEU, ROUGE: Text generation metrics
  • BERTScore: Semantic similarity
  • Human Eval: Code generation evaluation
  • TruthfulQA: Truthfulness evaluation
  • BigBench: Comprehensive benchmarks
  • HELM: Holistic evaluation framework

Security & Governance

  • Guardrails AI: LLM guardrails
  • NeMo Guardrails: NVIDIA’s safety toolkit
  • AI Fairness 360: Bias detection and mitigation
  • What-If Tool: Model interpretability
  • Responsible AI Toolkit: Microsoft’s framework
